law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 15A.370, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 281, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts as KRS 15A.370, ch. 295, sec. 97, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 305, sec. 2, effective June 21, 1974. -- Amended 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 6, effective March 29, 1956. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 41, effective June 15, 1950.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Commissioning employees of Department of State Police as law enforcement officers.
